docs.text: Installation Prerequisities Plato is developed by Stack , so you need to install it before installing Plato. Getting the source From GitHub $ git clone https://github.com/ksrky/Plato.git Building and Installing Using stack $ cd Plato $ stack install

docs.title: Prerequisities

docs.text: Using stack $ cd Plato $ stack install
